Protocols/CardCrypto.html#/c:@M@VirgilCr.name: generateSignature(of:using:)
Protocols/CardCrypto.html#/c:@M@VirgilCr.abstract: Generates the digital signature of data using specified private key.

Protocols/CardCrypto.html#/c:@M@VirgilCr.name: importPublicKey(from:)
Protocols/CardCrypto.html#/c:@M@VirgilCr.abstract: Imports public key from its raw data representation.

Protocols/CardCrypto.html#/c:@M@VirgilCr.name: exportPublicKey(_:)
Protocols/CardCrypto.html#/c:@M@VirgilCr.abstract: Exports public key to its raw data representation.

Protocols/AccessTokenSigner.html#/c:@M@V.name: generateTokenSignature(of:using:)
Protocols/AccessTokenSigner.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: Generates the digital signature of data using specified private key.

Protocols/AccessTokenSigner.html.name: AccessTokenSigner
Protocols/AccessTokenSigner.html.abstract: This protocol is responsible for signing & verifying tokens’ signatures.

Protocols/CardCrypto.html.name: CardCrypto
Protocols/CardCrypto.html.abstract: This protocol defines a list of methods that provide:

Protocols.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoAPI@obj.name: PrivateKey
Protocols.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoAPI@obj.abstract: Represents the private key or some kind of reference to the private key.

Protocols/PrivateKeyExporter.html.name: PrivateKeyExporter
Protocols/PrivateKeyExporter.html.abstract: This protocol is responsible for private keys import/export

Protocols.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoAPI@obj.name: PublicKey
Protocols.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoAPI@obj.abstract: Represents the public key or some kind of reference to the public key.
